Title: Medallion of a Fallen Friend
Description:
<This chewed up hunk of metal was once a beautiful ornament of great importance to a Shikaar centaur. 

Khasar may know more about the owner.>
ObjectivesText: Return the Medallion of a Fallen Friend to Khasar.
RewardText:
This medallion is all that remains of a dear friend of mine who ventured too far into the swamp this past season. I thought it lost to the elements.

I cut this leather from her first mammoth hunt. We were children, then.
